note: Truncated for app bundle; full narrative available in source documentation.

recovery_windows.MPS_timeline: After resistance training, MPS remains elevated ~24–48h; trained ~36h, untrained up to ~48h.
recovery_windows.muscle_damage_soreness_patterns: DOMS typically peaks 24–72h after novel/high-volume work; repeated bout effect reduces over time.
recovery_windows.performance_recovery_curves: Strength generally recovers within ~48–72h after a hard session; extremely taxing work may need longer.
recovery_windows.rest_by_intensity: Heavier/eccentric work needs ~48–72h; lighter work may recover in 24–48h.
